title: Locked out of phone after hard reset
content:
I have had to hard reset a client's pixel 2 as  he has forgotten his e mail address and lost his SIM card. when he lost his old phone and tried to enter what he thought was the details into his new phone.

We set up a new Google account but the new  phone keeps asking for the old e mail address etc.
What can I do as he doesn't know his old details and hasn't set up a recovery email etc.

I work at a homeless charity in Manchester and we had a donation of new pixel 2 XL  phones es given to us.for the clients who are engaging with us and other services on a regular basis.
Help please
